mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.project_id AS "projectId", a.taskmanager AS "taskmanager", a.taskname AS "taskname", a.tastplanbegintime AS "tastplanbegintime", a.taskplanendtime AS "taskplanendtime", a.expectedhour AS "expectedhour", a.taskcompleteschedule AS "taskcompleteschedule", a.taskcompletetime AS "taskcompletetime", a.tasktype AS "tasktype", a.worktype AS "worktype", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", u3.name AS "userName", prinfo.projectName AS "projectName"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u3 ON u3.id = a.taskmanager LEFT JOIN prho_project_info prinfo ON prinfo.id = a.project_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO prho_project_task( id, project_id, taskmanager, taskname, tastplanbegintime, taskplanendtime, expectedhour, taskcompleteschedule, create_date, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{projectId}, #{taskmanager}, #{taskname}, #{tastplanbegintime}, #{taskplanendtime}, #{expectedhour}, #{taskcompleteschedule}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE prho_project_task SET project_id = #{projectId}, taskmanager = #{taskmanager}, taskname = #{taskname}, tastplanbegintime = #{tastplanbegintime}, taskplanendtime = #{taskplanendtime}, expectedhour = #{expectedhour}, taskcompleteschedule = #{taskcompleteschedule}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
